title: Skype video
body: I am usualy talking with my friends playing league of legends by skype but i cant see them because skype goes behind lol all the time

replies.body: While in game open the in gsme options window, then select video. Change your video setting from fullscreen to windowed, then resize as necessary to show your skype screen.
Unfortunately, I'm not entirely sure I understand what your issue is exactly.  Do you want Skype to be visible over League of Legend itself?
I believe they mean the little screen that can do video in the upper corner when you switch to another application other than skype itself when in a call
